Men and Dragons once lived in harmony
on this land. However, that harmony
was broken when the men suddenly
started to invade. In a great war
known later as the Scouring, both
sides fought over dominion of the
continent. The laws of nature were
twisted from the vast amounts of
power that were released...
The Dragons were defeated and
disappeared from the face of continent.
Mankind then began to spread its
forces throughout to populate the land.
And now, 1000 years later...

on this land. However, that harmony

started to invade. In a great war

The great war between Dragons and men...[A]

and disappeared from Elibe...[A]

been defeated in the Scouring.[A]
[0A77]

military and a practical and pragmatic[A]

and the lesser nations are located between[A]
them.[A]

joint relationship of various marquesses.[A]

through the plains on horseback.[A]

between nation-states, there was a general[A]

Elibe.[A]

disrupted...[A]

King Zephiel, ruler of the Kingdom of Bern,
has sent his forces out to conquer the rest[A]
of Elibe.[A]

mercilessly massacred all those who stood[A]
against them.[A]
And now, Bern has shown signs of invading

[0B2E]
After Roy captured Aquleia, other Etrurian
powers slowly began to change their[A]
views and express their anti Coup d'etat
opinions. Driven away from their palace,[A]
[LoadOverworldFaces]Roartz [LoadOverworldFaces]and Arcard fled to[LoadOverworldFaces]
Sacae, which was still under Bern's control.[A]

[0B2F]
Sacae is the vast plain-covered
land in the center of the continent.[A]
Before Bern invaded, the various tribes
there led nomadic lives.[A]
[0B30]
The Etrurian army joined the Lycia Alliance
Army to form a joint Etruria-Lycia[A]
Union army. The decision was to head
[LoadOverworldFaces]for Sacae to get rid of the remaining[A]
Coup d'etat forces and also attack [LoadOverworldFaces]Bern,
who was behind them.[A]
[LoadOverworldFaces]Thinking that some Etrurian knight
groups would not approve of being seen[A]
under the Lycia Alliance Army, Roy
oficially named the new Union the[A]
"Etrurian Army" and became its commander.[A]
Roy led the division responsible[A]
for entering Sacae.[A]
[0B31]
The Sacae people are wary of outsiders
in the first place, but even worse,[A]
[LoadOverworldFaces]Brenya,[A]
another one of the Three Dragon Lords,
had gotten the largest tribe in Sacae,[A]
the Djute clan, under submission.
[LoadOverworldFaces]The warriors of the Djute tribe[A]
and Brenya's elite Bern troops stood in
front of Roy as he set foot on Sacae's soil.[A]
